description:
%%% INTRODUCTION SALE PRICE %%%
Whether you want to plan complex projects, or just simple ToDo lists,
with A1 Task Pro you have made the right choice.

You don't have to learn any complicated user interfaces, nor understand various organizational elements in A1 Task Pro, 
each task is created equal. 

It is just as easy to create a simple shopping list as createing a complete project plan, including time estimates.

With the AutoCalc feature is very easy to keep track of complex tasks. It will automatically update all values like percentages and times of its sub tasks.

This function is very powerful for creating time estimates, or to display the project's progress.

Feature List:
- Color Coded Task Lists 
- Multiple Levels
- Automatic calculation
- Percentage Bars in Lists
- Check Of Task direct from List
- Percentage with AutoCalc
- Time Estimated with AutoCalc
- Time Spend with AutoCalc
- Priorities
- Notes 
- Help Documents
- English and German translation 
- English and German support
- Optimized for horizontal and vertical use

Change Log:

V1.0.2
- Usability in Lists enhanced
  Using the Checkbox doesn't select a task

V1.0.1
- Minor Translation Fixes

V1.0.0
- Initial Release
